eksath jathinge sama sadhaka hamuda yatathe hayitiye randi sitina kisidu shri lankika hamuda samajikayekuta gataluwak mathuwi nomathi bawa hamuda madhya prakashaka brigediyar udaya nanayakkara mahatha pawasayi.hayitiye randi sitina sama hamuda samajikayekuma pilibandawama merata baladharin niranthara sodisiyen sitina bawaohu penwa denne yi.ee anuwa merata kisidu hamuda samajikayekuta hayitiyedi aapadawak siduwi nomathi bawayi nanayakkara mahatha awadharanaya kara sitiye.aahara bedime katayuthuwala nirathawa sitiyadi shri lankika hamuda samajikayin pirisak watakaragath hayiti wasiyan palanayakin thorawa aahara laba ganimata uthsaha kirima hethuwen gataluwak mathu wu bawata wides madhya wartha kara thibuni.apa kala wimasimakata pilithuru demin brigediyar udaya nanayakkara mahatha sadahan kale ewani thaththwayak pilibanda wartha nowu bawayi.
eya sahayogithawaye nawa man soya yamata pitubalayak sapayayi.
mata thawama meya pahadili natha.
mama kiyana prathipalaya siddha nowe yayi balaporoththu wuwath, chanda apekshakayanta muhuna dennata siddha wena asiruthawaya mama dakimi.

kamarayak sambandha sulu prashnayak roginge gela sirakarana tharamata waidyawarun ha hediyan dura diga gena yama janathawage dosha darshanayata hethuwi athi athara wagakiwayuthu niladharin mema prashna ihalata ya nodi wisada nogaththe nam paripalana anshayak rohalata awashya natha.janatha mudalin adhyapanaya laba thanaªruwalata pamini pasu waidya karmaya ha heda karmaya roginta karumayak bawata pathkarannata ida nodiya yuthu bawa rogihu pawasathi..

eya ahambau wikashayak ma nowunath, wyakula ekaki.

rakiya katayuthuwala karyabahulathawak daknata labena ada dina wyaparikayanta padu siduwiya haki bawa peni yayi.
waidyawarayata kiya niyama karawa gatha haki kurula walata adala prathikara aushadha kipayakma thiyenawa.
